pendingBookingsPanel.confirmationMsgLabel: Send a message along with the confirmation
pendingBookingsPanel.declineMsgLabel: Send a reason for the rejection

priceMatrix.emptyDescription: There is currently no price configured. Click on the button below the setup a pricematrix. The configured price will be used when users are creating a booking as well as being part of the confirmation email.

bookingReceipt.details: Your booking for {{pplCount}} overnight guests and {{tubCount}} spots for the hot tub in the period {{from}} to {{to}} has been reserved. You have received a receipt by email.When the booking is confirmed you will get another mail with confirmation and payment information.

createBooking.tubCountLabel: Number of people using hot tub
createBooking.tubCountPlaceholder: Number of people using hot tub

login.forgotPasswordDescription: If you forgot your password, click

register.description: Enter your information and click 'Register' and you will be ready in no time.
register.loggedinMsg: Welcome {{name}} to Tutlið booking. Before you can book Tutlið an admin will have to verify your account. You will get an email when you are good to go.
register.missingAdminApproval: Before you can book Tutlið an admin will have to verify your account. You will get an email when the account has been verified.

resetPassword.passwordUpdateMessage: Your password has now been updated.
resetPassword.completeMessage: If your email is registered in our system you will get an email with a link to reset your password.
resetPassword.description: Enter your email address here. If your email exists in our system you will get an email with information on how to reset your password.

AccessDenied.header: You dont have permission to access this page

accessDenied.requireLoginMsg: You need to login to access this page

homePage.greeting: Welcome to Tutlið booking! Create an account to book the sommer house for your next holiday!
